title: Children's Factory-CF900-924 Big Screen PlayPanel, Room Divider Panel, Free-Standing Classroom Partition Screen for Daycare/Homeschool/Preschool, Sky Blue
features: CREATE SMALLER FLEX-SPACES: Use PlayPanels to create any size, color or shape flex-space for small group activities. Room partitions ensure kids won't get distracted by neighboring activities and reduce noise so each small group can concentrate.

FRAME EASILY SNAPS TOGETHER: Lightweight, durable, plastic frame is designed to quickly snap together. Elastic loops attach to vinyl panels to create a secure, taut fit. 1 Sky Blue, Big Screen PlayPanel included with 1 set of disassembly pliers.

UNIVERSAL HINGES: Any Rectangular, Square or Big Screen PlayPanels can be connected vertically or horizontally to create interesting flex-spaces with the included Double Claw Clips. These create flexible hinges so the panels can quickly be folded and stored when not in use.

PLASTIC SUPPORT LEGS NOT INCLUDED: Weighted, cantilever legs connect to our PlayPanels to make them free-standing, stable room partitions. We recommend one set of legs for every 3-4 panels. Purchase the legs separately with Amazon Item B000NNNZ9W.
WARRANTY: 2 years. DIMENSIONS: 59.5" x 47.5" each panel. AGES: 4 months and older. ASSEMBLY REQUIRED. Made in the USA.
description: Room dividing panels serve a variety of purposes such as creating a quiet space for rest time or separating activities. Using dividers encourages children to focus on the lesson or activity at hand without distractions. Each panel easily attaches to another with double claw clips. One set of double claw clips included. The hygienic easy to clean vinyl surface is stretched over durable plastic pipe and fittings. Panels can be combined in different color combinations to create your own look. Can be used vertically or horizontally. Be sure to order one pair of PlayPanel legs (Sold Separately - Amazon Item B000NNNZ9W) for every 3 panels. 1 Sky Blue Big Screen PlayPanel included.
